import timestamp from "../images/Timestamp.png" import visit from "../images/VisitCount.png" import comment from "../images/CommentCount.png" import mockJson from '../json/posts.json' export default function Post({id}) { const jsonData = mockJson[0] function onClickHandler(){ console.log("this is title") } const body = jsonData.body.substring(0, 250); return (

{jsonData.title}

{body}...

{jsonData.date}

1 visits

1 comment

); }
